product_name: Ellington Heidi Mini Messenger Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: It's easy to be casually chic in the outdoors with the Heidi Mini Messenger. This handbag features a padded compartment to carry your e-reader, making it easy to take technology on any adventure.
short_description: It's easy to be casually chic in the outdoors with the Heidi Mini Messenger. This handbag features a padded compartment to carry your e-reader, making it easy to take technology on any adventure.
